page.title: 09HALLOW C.E.PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: {Hallow School}was founded in 1712.The building is most unusual and quite a landmark.There is a{clock tower}with a bell that strikes the hour.It gives the school the appearance of a church. The school has approx. 115 children. There are 5 classes 3 Junior and 2 Infant.The children take part in local {sports competitions, music festivals,} {local fetes}and related sports.As the school is a{church school,}during the year the children attend services in the church.At{Christmas}a play, sometimes musical, is presented in the school hall followed several days later by a{carol service}in the church part of which is held in{candlelight.} There is a yearly{musical evening}when the children show their musial talents and linked to this a house music competition.The{sport's day}with races for children and parents is great fun.
